content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”10px” margin_bottom=”10px” el_class=”theme-download”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]Demo Download Documentation [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” border_style=”solid” margin_bottom=”40px” el_class=”other-download”][vc_column width=”1/4″ padding_top=”6px” padding_right=”0px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
Fork on Github
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row border_style=”solid” margin_bottom=”40px”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Activello is a clean, minimal multipurpose WordPress blog theme developer using the Bootstrap frontend framework making it fully responsive and mobile-friendly. The theme features a pixel perfect graphics and design. Activello comes with several custom widgets and a fullscreen slider to showcase your content with style.

Activello theme is a very flexible free WordPress blog theme well suited for food, travel, adventures, photography, personal, fitness, corporate or any other awesome blog. The theme is optimized to work with WooCommerce, W3 Total Cache, Contact Form 7, Gravity Forms, Jetpack, Yoast SEO and many other free and premium WordPress plugins.

The theme is SEO friendly with Schema compatible structure that will make Google love your website. Activello theme is also fast to loads providing additional SEO and usability boost.

We are open to suggestions on how to make the Activello theme become the next big thing. If you feel that you know how to improve this theme even more, please let us know on the support forum or via Twitter.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Responsive & Flat Design

This theme is developed using Bootstrap 3 frontend framework which makes it fully responsive and optimized for all mobile devices such as iPad, iPhone, Android and Windows Phone. It executes “Mobile First” approach.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Retina Ready

Razor sharp text, vibrant colors, stunning graphics, sharp images, premium feel  and beautiful vectorized icons on HiDPI (Retina) displays.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

WordPress Customizer

Activello has dozen customization settings available via WordPress Theme Customizer. You can setup slider, change copyright information, change element color and do much more.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Featured Slider

Full screen featured slider will make your most important content to stand out. Slider is powered by FlexSlider, that provides several awesome features and stunning slide transitions.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Awesome Support

We have an outstanding support team and we will help you free of charge. Some additional services and website development services are also available. Feel free to leave a message on our support forum.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Infinite Scroll

Activello theme supports Infinite Scroll which makes your content easy to load ‘on the fly’. For more information, please see theme documentation.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Plugin Support

This theme supports most if not all free and premium WordPress plugins. We did extra optimization for most popular plugins such as Contact Form 7, Yoast SEO, Gravity Forms, Jetpack, W3 Total Cache, iThemes Security, Easy Bootstrap Shortcodes and many more

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

WooCommerce

WooCommerce is no longer a premium theme feature and you can get it now for free. Build your own eCommerce website with ease.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Translation Ready

Theme is translation and multilingual ready. More information is available on how to translate WordPress themes. We would really appreciate if you could help with translation into your language.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Font Awesome Icons

This theme has a built in Font Awesome support. These are vector based icons that can be used in any color and size anywhere in the website.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Unlimited Color Options

It is a highly customizable theme with unlimited color options. Theme colors can be changed using WordPress Theme Customizer live preview mode.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Theme Documentation

We have covered the most important functions on the detailed Theme instructions page that you can find here.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”10px” margin_bottom=”10px” el_class=”theme-download”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]Demo Download Documentation [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” border_style=”solid” margin_bottom=”40px” el_class=”other-download”][vc_column width=”1/4″ padding_top=”6px” padding_right=”0px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
Fork on Github
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs][vc_tta_section title=”Documentation” tab_id=”1449773514083-48d176f9-4906″][vc_column_text]
  • Theme Documentation
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Changelog” tab_id=”1449773551908-b225b0c5-03a8″][vc_column_text]= 1.3.4

  • Structured data missing hatom author
  • Allow theme to display more than 2 sub level menus

= 1.3.3

  • Fixed search functionality

= 1.3.2

  • Added a new Blog Layout
  • Added option to show all categories in the blog page
  • Fixed mobile menu
  • Integrated with Travis
  • Added a notice inside admin dashboard so users know they need to regenerate thumbnails

= 1.3.0 =

  • Fixed slider & JetPack Photon integration
  • Added Epsilon Framework as a git sub-module
  • Fixed image serving – we were serving larger images than necessary

= 1.2.0 =

  • Added Welcome Screen
  • Added Customizer Documentation Section
  • Fixed search menu css
  • Added for customizer colors defaults
  • Fixed Social Widget title bug
  • Fixed responsive menu css
  • Added logo max height
  • Added native WordPress Additional CSS section
  • Activello functions now are pluggable.
  • Fixed Woocommerce related tab issue
  • Added dates for comments
  • Fixed WordPress gallery css issue
  • Fixed categories html bug

= 1.1.0 =

  • Updated Bootstrap to 3.3.7
  • Updated Font Awesome to 4.6.3
  • Updated FlexSlider to 2.6.3

= 1.1.0 =

  • Added Link to documentation
  • Fixed compatibility errors with the WP 4.6 and PHP 7.
  • Now you can use unlimited number of slides on Slider
  • Other minor code tweaks and improvements
  • Added French translation thanks to Eddy Lelièvre-Berna
  • Added Greek translation thanks to Tsakman
  • Added Slovak translation thanks to Marek

= 1.0.3 =

  • Added TGMPA & Kiwi Social Share Plugin
  • Updated theme tags

= 1.0.2 =

  • Several improvements to get it approved on WordPress.org

= 1.0.1 =

  • Code cleanups
  • Added translation files

= 1.0 =

  • Initial release
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
